Uses of Class
org.ptolemy.commons.VersionSpecification

  • Packages that use VersionSpecification 
    Package Description
    org.ptolemy.classloading
    The interfaces and non-OSGi implementation of the ClassLoadingStrategy support.
    org.ptolemy.classloading.osgi
    The implementations that are used in an OSGi-based Ptolemy II runtime (remark that they do not have any dependency on OSGi APIs).
    org.ptolemy.commons
    This packagecontains the VersionSpecification abstract class and its only currently existing implementation; plus FutureValue: a Future implementation that can be used outside of the JDK ExecutorService.
    ptolemy.moml
    Modeling Markup Language classes.

      Constructors in org.ptolemy.classloading.osgi with parameters of type VersionSpecification 
      Constructor and Description
      DefaultModelElementClassProvider(VersionSpecification version, java.lang.Class<? extends NamedObj>... knownClasses)
      Create a provider that cares about class versions, i.e. it will check on class names and on the requested version to check if it can provide a requested class.

    • Uses of VersionSpecification in org.ptolemy.commons

      Subclasses of VersionSpecification in org.ptolemy.commons 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ThreeDigitVersionSpecification
      A simple implementation of a version specification, based on a merge of OSGi-conventions and Ptolemy (which in turn seems to be based on JNLP).
      Methods in org.ptolemy.commons that return VersionSpecification 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static VersionSpecification VersionSpecification.parse(java.lang.String version)
      Parses the given version String, using '.' , '-' , '_' as potential delimiters.
      Methods in org.ptolemy.commons with parameters of type VersionSpecification 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int ThreeDigitVersionSpecification.compareTo(VersionSpecification otherVersionSpecification)
      Compare this specification to the argument.
